con:testCase.name: PAYCTDOMOUEXRTP_SameBank
con:testCase.con:description:
Domestic Real Time External Payment Out negative scenario
PAYMENTTYPE: NRTP ISPC:PAYCTDOMOUEXRTP PAYMENT_CLASSIFICATION: Domestic ISEDITABLE:N

<urn2:messageIdentification>${=Math.abs(new Random().nextInt() % 6000000)+1}</urn2:messageIdentification> <urn2:endToEndIdentification>${#TestSuite#endtoendID}</urn2:endToEndIdentification>
